Package jmines.view.dialogs

This package contains all the dialogs classes : to display JMines information, to display best times, to create a custom game and to enter user name.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutDialog The dialog used to display information about JMines.
BestTimesDialog The dialog used to display the best player times.
ConfigurationFrame The frame used to display information about JMines.
CustomDialog This class is used to display dialog for the users who want to play a game with personalized number of lines, columns, and mines.
CustomDialog.Values An object representation of the dialog return.
NameDialog The dialog used to ask the user when name when he win a game.
RobotNameDialog The dialog used to ask the user when name when he win a game.
StatisticsDialog The dialog used to display the statistics.
ThanksDialog The dialog used to display thanks for JMines.
 

Package jmines.view.dialogs Description

This package contains all the dialogs classes : to display JMines information, to display best times, to create a custom game and to enter user name.
